channel.title: [562] Turning to an object [562]
channel.description:
I am adding the tunnel that comes in + out of the grand exchange, I have it coded, now all i need it a way for you're "player" to turn to the object on click, For example
- Clicks object - Goes right beside object - Clicks object again - "TURNS" to object and then uses it.
I have tried adding, "p.turnTo(9312);" To the method, but doesn't work

item.title: [562] Turning to an object [562]
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

I am adding the tunnel that comes in + out of the grand exchange, I have it coded, now all i need it a way for you’re “player” to turn to the object on click, For example

  • Clicks object
  • Goes right beside object
  • Clicks object again
  • “TURNS” to object and then uses it.

I have tried adding, “p.turnTo(9312);” To the method, but doesn’t work
